summary: This is an attempt to make a Drow Race that is more Forgotten Realms Lore friendly.
descriptionHtml:
I was trying to do an update for DrowRace to fix mounted combat and dawnguard bugs.  Long story short, I couldn\'t do it.  So, I simply remade it using the latest patch.  The new race is named DrowElfRace (the original is DrowRace).  So you can load them together and change races if you need to.  This was alot easier to create thanks to the Race Menu mod that is out.  Now all the black skin vs. gray skin debaters will both be happy.  I recommend changing the skin color LAST, after all other changes are made.  

I combined night vision with detect life, esentally Darkvision.  Given that Drow on the surface have trouble using this, I left the detect life magicka cost.  I also altered they way Faerie Fire works, it is now a cosmetic change to Fear.  Also, Globe of Darkness is now a cosmetic change to Frenzy.  Both spells have upgrades available at the forge under misc.  Drow start with the lowest tier of both spells. I also took the advice of some of you who posted and removed the poison/disease resistances.  I also tweeked the starting skill bonuses a little. (+5 to Alchemy, Enchanting, Illusion, Light Armour, One Handed, Smithing, and Sneak  ... total of +35 like vanilla races.) 

I didn\'t create any Drizzt gear this time.  You can smith/enchant better gear easy enough.  I tend to use magicka sabers anyway.  Hmm... Drizzt Do\'Urden, Jedi Knight!

Required Mods
RaceCompatibility for Dawnguard plus vanilla version upgrades by TMPhoenix
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24168
This is required for any custom race to work.  The base files are included with my mod, but check the original page for any updates.  I prefer this version of RaceCompatibility because it doesn\'t alter any scripts like others do.

SKSE
http://skse.silverlock.org/
This is required for Race Menu to work.

Race Menu
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29624
This is simply the greatest character creation mod ever!  This allows you to use any colors for any body part, or have multiple tatoos of different colors.  I would advise changing the body color last, after making all other changes.  This will help to stop the head/body color differences.  DrowElfRace.esp doesn\'t have any skin tones outside of DarkElf defaults.

Guenhwyvar version 1.2
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11036
Not required, but really, come on.  Check out my optional .esp that adds a 60s spell version.  (Pretend that the figurine is damaged in some way).

ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_5_Full
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
Not required, but my mod offers no other hair options than Skyrim default.  You can also select the female/male only versions.

Skyrim - Player Re-Voiced - Elven Races Complete 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19099
If you are playing a male elf, this is an excellent option.

Tools Used in the creation of Drow Elves

Attention Mod Authors - Mounted Combat and Race Records
http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/699347-attention-mod-authors-mounted-combat-and-race-records/

Custom Races Mounted Combat Fix by Warvok
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30857

Creating a Playable Race - The right way by Expired
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10165

MissAniThrope and chakaru11\'s C Eyes
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9915

Favored Souls males
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488

Nats Real Skin Toned CBBE
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32995

Better Females by Bella 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812


OLD MOD
All ideas were taken from reading the legend of Drizzt series of books and from http://forgottenrealms.wikia.com/wiki/Drow

Note - the way armour works in this game you will be using Dunmer resources.  I recommend either Unique Bodies or the Drows of Morrowind mods to cover this. (I use both)

Also - I added Drow to the Elf form lists, so any mod that adds to all elves will show up for Drow (like Appachi Hairs)

/////////////////
Racial Abilities
/////////////////
I lowered the height to .95 for females and .9 for males. (Drow females are larger than males and Drow are the shortest elven race).

Drow Weakness to Sunlight - A Drow\'s Health, Magicka, and Stamina recover to a slower (20%) extent while exposed to Sunlight. Unlike vampires there is no lowering of attributes, merely slower regeneration.  Drow aren\'t physically harmed by the sun like vampires are, merely annoyed by it.

Drow Resistance - 25% Resistance to Disease, Magic & Poison.  

/////////////////
Racial Powers
/////////////////

Infrasion - Same as Aura Whisper except excluding undead. 30s
Darkvision - Drow have a Lesser Power that grants Night Eye.  Lowered duration to 30s.
Faerie Fire -  Same as Magelight but I made everything I could purple. I left this as a spell instead of a lesser power because it is only a color change. 30s
Globe of Darkness - Same as Magelight but colored black.  I raised the radius to 20. I don\'t believe this will hinder mobs at all, in fact since it is \'light\' it may make you easier to spot. 30s  


/////////////////
Racial Skills 
/////////////////

Alchemy +5
Enchanting +10
One-Handed +5
Smithing +5
Sneak +5
Speach +5

/////////////////////
Installation Methods
/////////////////////

I recommend using NMM, but manual installation is straight foward.  You will need the script folder for this to work!

Guenhwyvar by Volek, You will need the original files for this to work. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11036
 I changed the duration to be 6 hours.  This matches the books as they are 12 hours out of every 48.  I also added another figurine to a corpse just outside Helgen.  Also added Twinkle and Iceingdeath.

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Assets used / Recommended Mods
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Optional - Add the awesome Guenhwyvar by Volek http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11036

Custom Races by d_rail http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8720

The Drows of Morrowind http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12292

Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- by Caliente http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles by Chris57 and FavoredSoul http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488

Highly Recommended (Seen in screenshots)

Unique Bodies - WIP by Rain The Windflower http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5968

ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168

Covereyes by mrLenski http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869

Badass Warpaint V1-1 by Skree000 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3377
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Other Mods
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Check out my other mod  Magicka Sabers Expanded by Aberation http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10517

Remember, dual wielding violet (or red) sabers looks awesome as a Drow.
author: Aberation
